HalbVokale 𓏲 Wr ⋍ rW / Wn 𓍢

𓏲 Round ϱ rhO rund wring
𓍢 W 𓍢𓏏 Wut (wrath,anger)
𓏲 wirbel vortex
𓍢 WN WON wound wind
𓍢 100 one hundred rand round sum
𓍢 Ⲣ ⲣ 100 Rhoundert Ρ, ρ
𓍢 Rund > Lunte Land -land suffix ⇔ 𓊖
𓍢 Wende ende fin win 卐 WÀN 卍

و v=or और 𓎛 and एवं evã व va

𓅱 wren wildcard fallacy

𓏲
noun endings -on -um -ma / -er
plural endings -n -m / -er
verb endings -en -um / -ier

The N component of 𓏲 [sic] / 𓍢 WN is attested thousand-fold, not least in:

𓆓 𓂧 𓏏 𓏲 Olive: ᵟzaytun
𓌸𓂋𓍢𓈇 harbor,pier: marina
𓊪 𓂧 𓋴 𓏲 𓏏 𓂾 𓈇 𓏥 sand dunes: pit-sand?
𓈎 𓄿 𓃀 𓍢 𓍢 𓍢 windings: Kurven
𓏲 𓄿 𓆼 𓇰 night (𓆼:kilo)
𓊤 𓏲 𓇋 𓇋 𓀜 𓏱 enemy: … / Feind?
𓏲 𓎛 𓏲 𓏏 𓌙 𓀀 𓁐 𓏥 family, kindred: nation
𓏲 𓎼 𓏏 𓄒 jaw: Nagt አገጭ ʾägäč̣ ⲟⲩⲟⲛ
𓏠 𓈖 𓏏 𓏲 𓅆 (divinity) Montu: Monthun / Monsun / Montezuma
𓎼 𓄿 𓏲 𓏏 𓐎 𓅪 𓏥 lack, want: gwant ⇔ garant
𓍬 𓏏 𓏲 injury: wound
𓈖𓆑𓏏𓊡𓏲 wind
𓊪 𓏲 whom/when
𓍘 𓏲 𓀁 yes ⇔ si, sein
𓍲 𓈖 𓏌 𓏳 enclose: schnüren
𓍲 𓈖 𓏌 𓏲 𓍢 net, meshes (of net): Schnuren
𓎸 𓅓 𓏲 𓃝 (divinity) Khnum
𓍋 𓃀 𓏲 𓐎 𓈉 (locality) Elephantine
𓉔 𓏏 𓏲 𓄛 ape: Hotten-Tier --
𓌻 𓂋 𓏲 𓈗 (pl.)canals, artificial lakes: Mauern --
𓎸 𓏲 𓀀 𓏥 𓁐 citizens, dependants, married couple: kin
𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 𓎡 𓏲 𓂠 𓏤 (diplomatic) gift: schenken

The ending 𓏲 and ς both might have been misread:
𓋭 𓊃 𓏲 𓀁 speech, utterance: phrase φάσις
𓋁 𓃀 𓏲 𓄛 𓏪 leopard : leopanter @ Levante
𓉔 𓄿 𓏲 𓂻 𓅭 𓏥 species of wild fowl: heron?

𓈖 𓇋 𓏲 𓂢 𓅭 ostrich ⇔ nȍj noj 鸟 niǎo nagħma نعام naʿām(a) יַעַן ⁿya'an ջայլամն ⁿǰaylamn mbuni

𓂧 𓈙 𓂋 𓏯 | wrath | çašr ⇔ kʰaɾɪç
𓂧 𓈙 𓂋 𓏏 𓏯 | wrath | çwrath > Wut 𓍢 𓏏 (anger)

𓍢 100 cien chien chain 𓍿𓃛𓅱𓃡
